mean_cn: adj.冒犯的，无礼的；攻击性的；  n.进攻，侵犯
mean_en: rude in a way that causes you to feel upset, insulted or annoyed; extremely unpleasant; connected with the act of attacking somebody/something; connected with the team that has control of the ball; connected with the act of scoring points
sentence: She found his words very offensive, which made her really upset.
sentence_trans: 她因为他的无礼言辞感到非常心烦。
word_etyma: of反对 + fens保护 + ive名词后缀 → 反对保护 → 侵犯 → 冒犯
